name: Life on the Pond
description:
DESCRIPTION

Life on the Pond is a high-score game about surviving  a frog-infested pond, armed only with a fishing rod. There are no fish.

It was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 79. The theme was "frogs", hence the frogs, and the limitation was "only one level", so I made a game where you slowly build the level up as you play. I uploaded an hour late due to various bugs.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys, WASD or Left Joystick to move.

Space on the keyboard, or A on a controller to use your fishing rod.

CREDITS

A game by David Ford.

Fredoka font by Milena Brandao.
